page.title: 03Parish Council & Community
page.content: beyond economic repair and the Elsenham Community Association are planning to build a smaller hall or pavilion on the playing field as soon as the necessary money can be raised. This will involve selling the site of the old community centre and raising funds for the new building. For its part the Parish Council have already granted Â£3,000 towards the provision of electricity and water and drainage services, and intend to sell a piece of the playing field to the Community Association at a normal price to facilitate the scheme. The playing field currently has two football pitches and two all weather tennis courts and it hopes that the provision of a pavilion will increase the amenity value of the area.
